overview: Since their first game on April 11, 1962, the New York Mets have mesmerized fans with a magical blend of personality, greatness, heartbreak and heroics.  This special film honors the 50 greatest Mets as determined by a blue ribbon panel consisting of Gary Cohen, Ralph Kiner, Steve Hirdt, Howie Rose and John Harper.
title: New York Mets: 50 Greatest Players
